name: v0.18.2
body:
Release version 0.18.2

Changes are listed in the [CHANGELOG](http://peppy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html)

name: v0.18.1
body:
Install from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/peppy/):
```
pip install peppy
```
Or install from GitHub:
```
pip install https://github.com/pepkit/peppy/zipball/v0.18.1
```
Changes are listed in the [CHANGELOG](http://peppy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html)
